website_summaries.verdict: The sleek and minimalist silhouette of the Puma Smash v2 Leather makes it a versatile kick for daily wear. The solid white or black colorway make it blend well with a variety of clothes while its smooth leather finish gives it a clean and polished look that is pleasing to the eyes. Puma did not scrimp on giving in-shoe comfort and midsole cushioning over the high grip and durable rubber outsole, making it a shoe to consider for those looking for an affordable all-around sneaker.
pros: Some commenters appreciate the smooth leather finish of the Puma Smash v2 Leather
Several buyers like the slim tennis shoe silhouette that is reminiscent of court releases in the 1970s
The low-top sneaker has a supple and comfortable in-shoe feel from the textile lining and padded collar and tongue
A considerable number of users find the cushioned midsole comforting as some users claimed they did not feel tired after wearing them for long hours
A couple of users like the all-black and all-white colorways of the Puma Smash v2 Leather as they are easy to style and mix with different kinds of clothing
A lot of reviewers find this tennis shoe well-constructed and high quality that it could last several months of daily use without signs of damage
A few customers find a value for money in purchasing this budget-friendly sneaker
The leather sneaker looks good on wearers whether they are in shorts or jeans
A handful of commenters disclosed that the pattern rubber outsole has a solid grip and traction on a variety of surfaces
cons: A few reviewers find the toe box narrow even if they got the right size
Some creasing on the smooth leather material in the upper bother a few customers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality mostly synthetic trainers - still haven't learned my lesson
customer_reviews.text: The product description says leather outer in one place, but leather and synthetic in another (which I did not notice). Only the puma design is leather and most of the shoe is a cheap synthetic material. Also, there is no stitching round the outside of the sole. I presume this means the upper is simply glued on, so I am expecting these to fall apart like the last pair of cheap pumas I bought. The £60 RRP Pumas are usually better quality. At £35 these cheaper quality of these shoes is maybe tolerable, but I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are superb, great fit, super comfy. Contrary to some of the reviews i can confirm the material these are made from is leather, very nice quality leather to be specific. Only the logos are made from plastic. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Leather Uppers - not :(
customer_reviews.text: Caveat Emptor: These trainers do NOT have real leather uppers. Very disappointed, returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve.P

customer_reviews.title: Puma for the win.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of shoes. Well made, comfortable, nice (faux) leather finish, durable and it looks so nice. The price is amazing considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kormega

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing fit and overall quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased those Puma trainers thinking they look nice knowing the brand, but once I've received them and tried them on, and straight away the fit wasn't great. The trainers feel heavy and even though the size is right, and most importantly, they don't fit properly on the feet. There's a gap on both sides between the ankle and the fabric which doesn't give a great look when wearing the trainers. I wouldn't recommend anyone to buy those specific shoes as it would be a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: EM23

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not leather
customer_reviews.text: Look very smart, love the dark blue stripes & wedge soles. But very disappointed that these are not leather uppers as indicated in the description, they are an imitation, with possibly a bit of leather around the lace areas for additional strength. As a result, they mark quite easily as the imitation leather is soft & not very strong. Hence only 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting and comfortable trainers. These were a deal of the day and have provided good value for money. They arrived when expected on schedule, and i have been using them as everyday wear as they look good with a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Peter from Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: They are and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trainers because it was advertised as being made of leather, but it is a false advertisement. They don't have real leather and feel cheap. Plus, the advertised memory foam sole is a fake ad too. You have a removable insole on top of a low-cost plastic sole. It doesn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Cristina Conchinha Marcão

customer_reviews.title: Still comfy... have not lost their spongey-ness.
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers. I wanted something that wasnt fabric on top and let rain in or sponge on sole and soak up water so I went 'old skool' with these. I was a bit dubious about the 'soft foam' inner soles, however, months later, they're still as spongey as when they were new.
customer_reviews.author: PowerSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: My favourite shoes for work
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and I make 12 hours shifts, standing up most of the time. My job is very challenging and my feet must be comfortable all the time. I tried many types of shoes, and until now this model is my favorite. I use this model for 3 years now and I am really satisfied. Very good price for these comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in quality
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but are lacking in quality. I bought these trainers a few months ago and they are already splitting. I expect trainers to last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tad bit too big. :/
customer_reviews.text: A bit big, but for the price, it's okay. UK Size 7 or EU41 was 90% of the time perfect. This does not feel like EU40.5 for sure. After couple of days, it is starting to feel comfy though!
customer_reviews.author: AttilaTheHun

customer_reviews.title: Are a narrow fit.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and although they are narrower he still liked them. Will probably free up when they have been worn as few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Close to Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are super comfy, fit well and look fantastic. Sadly the tongue is super thin and feels of comparatively poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rookie Brushes

customer_reviews.title: Puma-tastic
customer_reviews.text: Really smart, really comfortable, not too heavy or bulky, to wear with jeans or doing some light sport.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price very comfortable to wear look great on
customer_reviews.text: This fit great as I know any way as I own 2 pairs of other styles already.had to send first pair back as hard a bad imprint on them .but they sent second pair out asap .so well happy
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I've only had the trainers just under 3 months and they have both split in exactly the same place underneath the heel already. The fact its happened to both in the same place must mean a defect in the trainers. So now basically unwearable as uncomfortable to walk in, no cushion and feet get soaked if its wet outside. I expected much better from Puma.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Charles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe But memory foam liner wears out really quickly, beware Otherwise good for the money

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Will b buying these for Xmas presents

customer_reviews.title: Great value!

customer_reviews.title: Too poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Come up a tiny bit small

customer_reviews.title: Recommend

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought Reebok

customer_reviews.title: very comfy

customer_reviews.title: That they are very comfortable

product_meta.title: PUMA Smash V2 Leather Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Smash was such a hit on the courts, we’ve decided to take these classic sports shoes and deem them an all-around fashion icon. Updated with softer leather and an improved feel and fit, we’re pretty sure they’ll earn top-seed status.
